fullText: Stefano Massini's epic chronicle of the rise and fall of Lehman Brothers is transformed into theatrical gold by director Sam Mendes and three extraordinary actors.
dtliExcerpt: Stefano Massini's epic chronicle of the rise and fall of Lehman Brothers is transformed into theatrical gold by director Sam Mendes and three extraordinary actors.
